availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Organized at Pendleton, Ohio. Mustered in May and June, 1861, and mustered out on June 19, 1864. Commander(s): Colonel William E. Woodruff, Colonel Thomas D. Sedgewick, Lieutenant Colonel George W. Neff, Lieutenant Colonel Warner Spencer, and Lieutenant Colonel John R. Hurd.

ab.bibl:
Frederick Henry Dyer, A Compendium of the War of the Rebellion, (Des Moines: Dyer Publishing Company, 1908), p. 1198.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 556-593.
